title: S14 Ep40: In Memory of Stanton Friedman: Fact, Fiction, and Flying Saucers
itunes:title: In Memory of Stanton Friedman: Fact, Fiction, and Flying Saucers
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS honors and pays respect to the late UFOlogist, Stanton Friedman.

In today's show, we celebrate Stanton's life by replaying an interview with Stanton and his fellow Co-Author, Kathleen Marden as they talk about the clear conspiracy to deny the existence of UFOs.
